EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-General.Email 1_Top 5 Reasons flyer
EmailTemplate.subject: What can an OpenStack cloud do for your business?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Change the game for your end users — and your business Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
You’re exploring the idea of cloud technologies for your enterprise. But your business is complex. How can you know if cloud is the right fit?
Look no further. Our one-page overview <[[http://resources.nokia.com/asset/200355?did=d0000000007h&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email1a-top5flyer&utm_term=general]]> highlights the top five advantages of an OpenStack private cloud.
It’s time to change the game. Get the details now!
I hope that you enjoy this document. Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
